News.headline: Match Preview: FC Halifax Town v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.page_title: Match Preview: FC Halifax Town v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.URL_keywords: Match Preview: FC Halifax Town v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.short_description: A preview of the Daggers Emirates FA Cup first round replay against FC Halifax Town tonight.
News.description:
The Daggers will be hoping make it to the second round of the Emirates FA Cup and get back to winning ways after their defeat to the hands of Gateshead at home on Saturday.

FC Halifax Town currently sit fourth in the National League North having only lost three games in all competitions so far this season, and beat Harrogate to get to this stage of the cup. 

Previous 5 Results 

Daggers
Daggers 0-5 Gateshead
Daggers 0-0 Halifax (Emirates FA Cup) 
Forest Green 1-1 Daggers 
Daggers 1-0 Aldershot 
Daggers 1-1 Macclesfield 

FC Halifax Town
Halifax 2-0 Kidderminster Harriers
Daggers 0-0 Halifax (Emirates FA Cup)
Halifax 1-3 Brackley 
Halifax 3-1 United of Manchester 
Boston 1-4 Halifax 

Team News
Okenabirhie, Robson, Howell and Williams will still miss out following their injuries. Guttridge and Benson will continue to try and regain full fitness following their appearances in the defeat to Gateshead.  

Previous Meetings
The Daggers and the Shaymen have met 17 times with Halifax winning six of the meetings, the Daggers winning five and their being six draws. 

Tickets
Ticket information for the game can be found here.

Social Media & Online
Follow the Daggers on Twitter for live updates throughout the match (@Dag_RedFC). There will also be updates on our Facebook page (OfficialDaggers). After the match there will be a match report on the website.
